title: LLM Markup Global Policy Header
description: Schema for the LLM Markup Global Policy Header defining site-wide constraints and defaults.

defaults.description: Default attribute values applied to the entire document unless overridden locally.

constraints.description: Hard constraints that cannot be overridden by local attributes.

block-selectors.description: List of CSS selectors that must be forcibly blocked from the LLM input.

dependencies.description: Rules enforcing co-occurrence of elements in the LLM context. If the 'trigger' element is included, the 'requires' element MUST also be included.

trigger.description: CSS selector for the element that triggers this dependency.

requires.description: CSS selector for the element that MUST accompany the trigger.

scope.description: Whether this applies to what the LLM sees (input) or what it generates (output).

failure-mode.description: Action to take if the requirement is not met. 'omit-trigger' removes the triggering element from context; 'error' halts processing.
